plot: A weird and bizarre clockwork puppet tries to escape from a small box that holds him prisoner, while a mysterious tormentor keeps his efforts, pleased.
title: Le Malinconiche pene del GROM
plot_es: A weird and bizarre clockwork puppet tries to escape from a small box that holds him prisoner, while a mysterious tormentor keeps his efforts, pleased.
plot_en: A weird and bizarre clockwork puppet tries to escape from a small box that holds him prisoner, while a mysterious tormentor keeps his efforts, pleased.
